survey_description: Assesses the perceived challenge level of the program content
Measures the impact of apprenticeship on career and work activities
Assesses the likelihood of recommending the apprenticeship program
Explores the impact of the apprenticeship on work-life balance
Assesses the development of technical skills during the apprenticeship
Collects feedback on the collaboration experience within the apprenticeship
Assesses the alignment of the apprenticeship with the apprentice''s job role
Measures the effectiveness of mentorship in the apprenticeship
Explores the impact of the apprenticeship on professional growth
